input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Puleo International 6.5Ft Pre-Lit Flocked Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 4.5-ft. Pre-Lit Flocked Aspen Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Costway 5FT Pre-Lit Hinged Christmas Tree Snow Flocked w/9 Modes Remote Control Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6.5-ft. Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9-ft. Pre-lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 6.5 ft. Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Premier Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 5' Pre-Lit Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 9' Pre-Lit Franklin Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='HOMCOM 7.5' Prelit Artificial Christmas Xmas Tree'
  - Name='LuxenHome 7.5Ft Pre-Lit Flocked Slender Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 12' x 62" Frosted Douglas Fir Artificial Slim Unlit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 9ft. Flocked Livingston Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Pine Cones and 650 Clear Warm LED Lights'
  - Name='Davenport Fir 6.5ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 7.5' x 44" Douglas Fir Artificial Slim Christmas Tree with Warm White LED Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6.5Ft Pre-Lit Flocked Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height and Douglas Fir type with pre-lit feature; differences include flocking and possibly branch tip technology and shape, but overall very similar function and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 4.5-ft. Pre-Lit Flocked Aspen Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial fir tree but smaller height and different fir species (Aspen Fir vs. Douglas Fir); flocked which differs from downswept natural appearance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 5FT Pre-Lit Hinged Christmas Tree Snow Flocked w/9 Modes Remote Control Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit and hinged branches similar, but smaller height and flocked with remote control lights indicates different features and appearance not downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6.5-ft. Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, height, pre-lit, Downswept Douglas Fir and likely similar technology; differs in pencil slim design versus full bodied but very close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9-ft. Pre-lit Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, pre-lit, downswept Douglas Fir and pencil slim shape but taller at 9 ft.; strong similarity in construction and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6.5 ft. Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Premier Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height and pre-lit Douglas Fir but named 'Premier' which suggests different branch tip technology and potentially differing branch design; no downswept or flocking specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 5' Pre-Lit Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller height and flocked finish with a fir tree pre-lit, but no suffix indicating downswept or Douglas Fir specifically; less similar in silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 9' Pre-Lit Franklin Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different fir species (Franklin Fir), larger height, and no mention of downswept shape or branch tip technology; pre-lit only similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HOMCOM 7.5' Prelit Artificial Christmas Xmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General pre-lit artificial tree; no specific species, branch tip technology, or silhouette mentioned; likely very different construction and appearance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: LuxenHome 7.5Ft Pre-Lit Flocked Slender Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slender and flocked tree which differs from downswept and feel real branch tip technology; pre-lit but less similar silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 12' x 62" Frosted Douglas Fir Artificial Slim Unlit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Douglas Fir and slim silhouette somewhat align but much taller and unlit and frosted (flocked), differing from pre-lit feel real downswept construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 9ft. Flocked Livingston Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Pine Cones and 650 Clear Warm LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit with 650 clear lights similar to reference but uses different fir species, flocked finish and added decorations; also taller and likely different branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Davenport Fir 6.5ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height and pre-lit artificial fir, but species and branch technology unspecified; likely similar purpose but less detail on downswept shape or feel real branches.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 7.5' x 44" Douglas Fir Artificial Slim Christmas Tree with Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Douglas Fir pre-lit slim tree somewhat similar in species and lighting but slimmer silhouette and different height and branch technology not specified.
